title: Join ACM | ACM@UIC
contents: Skip to main content          Toggle navigation              Association for Computing Machinery Student Chapter at the University of Illinois at Chicago          Main navigation    Home                                       Breadcrumb    Home >               Username    Password     Reset your password    Tools    Not a member? Click here!      ACM Menu    About    Officers    ACM Constitution    Office Policies    Members      SIGs - Active    SIG AI    SIG AlgoTrading    SIG BlockChain    SIG Game    SIG Math Coding    SIG SysAdmin    SIG Windows      SIGs - Defunct    SIG App    SIG Android    SIG Build    SIG Compete    SIG Security    SIG Code    SIG MedTech    SIG Sudo    SIG HCI    SIG Micro    SIG UX    LUG Web    SIG Pwn    SIG Code Review    SIG Open              Join ACM         If you are looking to get involved with ACM, there's no better way than simply showing up! Drop by our office or one of our many meetings or events. You don't have to be an official member or an engineering major...you just have to have an interest!  That said, there are definite perks in official membership.   an Active Directory account that gives you access to our server, website, office machines, and Local Area Network  access to our technical library  eligibility to start SIGs and run for leadership positions in the ACM   To officially join the ACM at UIC, all you have to do is fill out a Membership Application form at a general meeting or at our office and pay the annual membership fee of $10 (covers the academic year starting in Fall).    To sign up for this ACM Chapter, please fill out this online form!: https://forms.gle/UPduD9ennZ83SR4r8    Other ways to join:    Come find an ACM officer  Email officers@acm.cs.uic.edu  Come to an ACM General Body Meeting ( see calendar )   If the form give you a permission denied error, please make sure to sign out of all other google accounts before logging into your UIC GApps Account.    Ways to connect with us:   Sign up for the mailing list (Announce-only or General Discussion)  Follow us on Facebook  Join ACM's Slack workspace   Also, if you would like to join our main mailing list, you can follow this link for instructions.  Interested? Contact us!
